name: Endless Nightmares
description:
Endless Nightmares

Description

Every time you fall asleep, you always end up having the same nightmares, and you don’t know why. They always seem so real and vivid. The same things always happen as well, and when you get caught by the monsters or die, you just get put back right at the beginning only to have to do it all over again. Will you ever wake up and have the torture end? Is this your new reality?

Controls

A - left

D - right

SPACE press - jump

Space hold - fly

Developed in Unity

Music made in beepbox.co

Sprites made with piskelapp.com

Art drawn in Clip Studio
